alert.note: Alert for Beltrami; Clearwater; Pennington; Red Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 11:58PM CDT until July 27 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Red Lake County in northwestern Minnesota... West central Beltrami County in north central Minnesota... Eastern Pennington County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Clearwater County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over High Landing, or 17 miles east of Thief River Falls, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... High Landing, Roland and western Lower Red Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
